achievements.name: ASW_KILL_WITHOUT_FRIENDLY_FIRE
achievements.description: Kill 25 drones without friendly fire.  Four marines must be present in the mission.

achievements.name: ASW_NO_FRIENDLY_FIRE
achievements.description: Complete a mission with no friendly fire incidents.  Four marines must be present in the mission.

achievements.name: ASW_SHIELDBUG
achievements.description: Deliver the finishing blow to a Swarm Shieldbug.

achievements.name: ASW_GRENADE_MULTI_KILL
achievements.description: Kill 6 Swarm with a single Grenade.

achievements.name: ASW_ACCURACY
achievements.description: Complete a mission with better than 90% accuracy.

achievements.name: ASW_NO_DAMAGE_TAKEN
achievements.description: Complete a mission on Normal difficulty or harder without receiving any damage.

achievements.name: ASW_EGGS_BEFORE_HATCH
achievements.description: Destroy all Swarm Eggs in a mission without allowing any to hatch.

achievements.name: ASW_GRUB_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 100 Swarm Grubs.

achievements.name: ASW_MELEE_PARASITE
achievements.description: Kill a Swarm Parasite with a melee attack.

achievements.name: ASW_MELEE_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 20 Swarm with melee attacks in a single mission.

achievements.name: ASW_BARREL_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 5 Swarm with explosive barrels in a single mission.

achievements.name: ASW_INFESTATION_CURING
achievements.description: Cure an Infested marine.

achievements.name: ASW_FAST_WIRE_HACKS
achievements.description: Complete 10 wire hacks without access being logged.

achievements.name: ASW_FAST_COMPUTER_HACKS
achievements.description: Complete 10 computer hacks without access being logged.

achievements.name: ASW_GROUP_HEAL
achievements.description: Heal all 4 marines with a single Heal Beacon.

achievements.name: ASW_GROUP_DAMAGE_AMP
achievements.description: Kill 15 Swarm with all four marines under the effects of a Damage Amp in a single mission.

achievements.name: ASW_FAST_RELOADS_IN_A_ROW
achievements.description: Successfully perform 5 fast reloads in a row.

achievements.name: ASW_FAST_RELOAD
achievements.description: Successfully perform a fast reload.

achievements.name: ASW_ALL_HEALING
achievements.description: Heal 300 points of damage in a single mission without dealing any non-melee damage to the Swarm.

achievements.name: ASW_PROTECT_TECH
achievements.description: Guard the squad's tech so that he takes no damage during the hack.

achievements.name: ASW_TECH_SURVIVES
achievements.description: Finish a mission without the tech getting killed.

achievements.name: ASW_STUN_GRENADE
achievements.description: Stun 6 Swarm with a single Stun Grenade.

achievements.name: ASW_WELD_DOOR
achievements.description: Seal a door with the welder.

achievements.name: ASW_DODGE_RANGER_SHOT
achievements.description: Roll under a Swarm Ranger projectile.

achievements.name: ASW_BOOMER_KILL_EARLY
achievements.description: Kill a Swarm Boomer before it inflates.

achievements.name: ASW_FREEZE_GRENADE
achievements.description: Freeze 6 Swarm with a single Freeze Grenade.

achievements.name: ASW_AMMO_RESUPPLY
achievements.description: Deploy 10 ammo stashes that are used by other marines.

achievements.name: ASW_SENTRY_GUN_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 500 Swarm with deployable Sentry Guns.

achievements.name: ASW_RIFLE_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with the Assault Rifle.

achievements.name: ASW_PRIFLE_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with a Prototype Rifle.

achievements.name: ASW_AUTOGUN_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with an Autogun.

achievements.name: ASW_SHOTGUN_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with a Shotgun.

achievements.name: ASW_VINDICATOR_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with a Vindicator.

achievements.name: ASW_PISTOL_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with Twin Pistols.

achievements.name: ASW_PDW_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with PDWs.

achievements.name: ASW_TESLA_GUN_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with a Tesla Cannon.

achievements.name: ASW_RAILGUN_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with a Rail Rifle.

achievements.name: ASW_FLAMER_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with a Flamethrower.

achievements.name: ASW_CHAINSAW_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with a Chainsaw.

achievements.name: ASW_MINIGUN_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with a Minigun.

achievements.name: ASW_SNIPER_RIFLE_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with a Marksman Rifle.

achievements.name: ASW_GRENADE_LAUNCHER_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 250 Swarm with a Grenade Launcher.

achievements.name: ASW_HORNET_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 100 Swarm with Hornet Barrages.

achievements.name: ASW_LASER_MINE_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 100 Swarm with Laser Tripmines.

achievements.name: ASW_MINE_KILLS
achievements.description: Kill 100 Swarm with Incendiary Mines.

achievements.name: ASW_UNLOCK_ALL_WEAPONS
achievements.description: Unlock all the available weapons.

achievements.name: ASW_EASY_CAMPAIGN
achievements.description: Complete the Jacob's Rest campaign on Easy difficulty or harder.

achievements.name: ASW_NORMAL_CAMPAIGN
achievements.description: Complete the Jacob's Rest campaign on Normal difficulty or harder.

achievements.name: ASW_HARD_CAMPAIGN
achievements.description: Complete the Jacob's Rest campaign on Hard difficulty or harder.

achievements.name: ASW_INSANE_CAMPAIGN
achievements.description: Awarded for finishing the Jacob campaign on Insane difficulty.

achievements.name: ASW_KILL_GRIND_1
achievements.description: Kill 1,000 Swarm.

achievements.name: ASW_KILL_GRIND_2
achievements.description: Kill 5,000 Swarm.

achievements.name: ASW_KILL_GRIND_3
achievements.description: Kill 25,000 Swarm.

achievements.name: ASW_KILL_GRIND_4
achievements.description: Kill 100,000 Swarm.

achievements.name: ASW_SPEEDRUN_LANDING_BAY
achievements.description: Complete Landing Bay within 1:25 on Normal difficulty or harder without any marines dying.

achievements.name: ASW_SPEEDRUN_DESCENT
achievements.description: Complete Cargo Elevator within 2:50 on Normal difficulty or harder without any marines dying.

achievements.name: ASW_SPEEDRUN_DEIMA
achievements.description: Complete Deima Surface Bridge within 2:30 on Normal difficulty or harder without any marines dying.

achievements.name: ASW_SPEEDRUN_RYDBERG
achievements.description: Complete Rydberg Reactor within 3:10 on Normal difficulty or harder without any marines dying.

achievements.name: ASW_SPEEDRUN_RESIDENTIAL
achievements.description: Complete SynTek Residential within 2:30 on Normal difficulty or harder without any marines dying.

achievements.name: ASW_SPEEDRUN_SEWER
achievements.description: Complete Sewer Junction within 1:30 on Normal difficulty or harder without any marines dying.

achievements.name: ASW_SPEEDRUN_TIMOR
achievements.description: Complete Timor Station within 4:25 on Normal difficulty or harder without any marines dying.

achievements.name: ASW_CAMPAIGN_NO_DEATHS
achievements.description: Complete a campaign on Normal difficulty or harder without any marines dying.

achievements.name: ASW_MISSION_NO_DEATHS
achievements.description: Complete a mission on Normal difficulty or harder without any marines dying.

achievements.name: ASW_PARA_HAT
achievements.description: Complete 2 co-op missions online. Earns a Team Fortress 2 parasite hat.

achievements.name: ASW_IMBA_CAMPAIGN
achievements.description: Awarded for finishing the Jacob campaign on Brutal difficulty.

achievements.name: ASW_HARDCORE
achievements.description: Complete any mission on Brutal difficulty with Onslaught and Hardcore Friendly Fire enabled.
